Package global.coda.hospitalmanagement.mappers

Interface UserMapper

@Mapper
public interface UserMapper

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int createUser​(User user)  
    int deleteUser​(int id)  
    int deleteUserPermanently​(int id)  
    java.util.List<User> readAllUsers()  
    User readUserByEmail​(java.lang.String email)  
    User readUserById​(int id)

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      @Insert("insert into t_user(username,email,password,fk_role_id,phone,age) values(#{userName},#{email},#{password},#{fkRoleId},#{phone},#{age})") @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true, keyProperty="pkUserId", keyColumn="pk_user_id") int createUser​(User user)

    • readAllUsers

      @Select("select * from t_user where is_active=1") java.util.List<User> readAllUsers()

    • readUserById

      @Select("select * from t_user where pk_user_id=#{id} and is_active=1") User readUserById​(int id)

    • readUserByEmail

      @Select("select * from t_user where email=#{email} and is_active=1") User readUserByEmail​(java.lang.String email)

    • updateUser

      @Update("update t_user set username = #{userName},email = #{email},password = #{password},fk_role_id = #{fkRoleId},phone = #{phone},age=#{age} where pk_user_id=#{pkUserId}") int updateUser​(User user)

    • deleteUser

      @Update("update t_user set is_active=0 where pk_user_id = #{id} and is_active=1") int deleteUser​(int id)

    • deleteUserPermanently

      @Delete("delete from t_user where pk_user_id = #{id}") int deleteUserPermanently​(int id)
